post.body: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACKKKKKKKKKK!! I'd be stressing big time!
Exactly- no meds, no medical intervention period.
oh cool!! My song that defines my life is "Small Town". The other song that defines my worldview is "Check it Out"
Darn straight. No pun intended.
That's one of my favorite Michael W. Smith songs, too. I also love "Place in this World". I'd love to have that on my mp3 now.
Would love to get together with you. I want to learn how to knit!
John Cougar Mellencamp was just on my latest play.
There was a full rock band within our local marching band- they did Queen's "Bohemian Rhapsody". Pretty cool performance.
That TOTALLY rocks!!
Muscle weighs more than fat. :)
One of my friends' @ their wedding used "You're the Inspiration" for their 1st dance song. It was sweet.
My hubby just said we have some morning and evening magic hours. Monday night we're going to the movie park!
7, they'll be 8 next Friday! My babies are growing up too fast.
Cool beans. Is it gluten/casein free diet? Feingold diet? I've heard so many diets that are supposed to work well. Thanks a ton!
Good thing to know about Animal Kingdom. Thanks for the heads up. :)
Good thing to know about Animal Kingdom. Thanks for the heads up.
My hubby will like the biergarten. Tiki bar sounds like fun. Not sure I'll be doing much drinking w/ the boys in tow. :-(
Today was better than yesterday a little bit. Had to take C to the hospital to find out why he's talking like a frog.
Yes we are! The first four nights we're at Pop Century. The last night I don't know where since we have go to off property.
UGH. Darn fail whale.
